resources.string: Delete current note?\nYou won\'t be able to recover it
You are leaving editing mode.\nWill like to save changes

Note edit app simple and secured for keeping text notes. It have the capability of exporting your text to file to be view on computer. Not leaving out ability to share with other Apps like message, WhatApp, and Facebook e.t.c. Apart provide a good interface for typing, it also gives you ability open any file as text file to see it raw content as text. Creating notes can be from web directly by selecting what need and sharing it with the App(A Note Editor). The app is aim at speed for manipulating simple notes. How to use the app The app have following interface
Start (Lock app if enable) Notes lists (initial view) Reading mode Editing mode Settings App Guide
Now open the app Start (Lock app if enable) This will require you to authenticate using your finger print pin or password word( Note: This interface is secured and we did not access to your password, pin, finger print or others we only receive basic action in our code such as succeed or failed) Always enable security to prevent unwanted user accessing your phone. Functions available Note list view Press on add button to create new note(bottom center). Press on a note to read note (in reading mode you can edit by pressing the edit icon{pen}) Press search icon(top right second icon) then type to search for notes(use to find note when notes list is much. Press options menu icon(top right first icon) to see the following options: Share App, ---> Share the app link with family and friends Open File, ---> Open any file as text file App Guid, ---> See basic usage scenario Help, ---> Open for more help Settings ---> Change sorting, ordering and security preferences of the app
Functions available Note Editing mode press the check to save note and read without keyboard(that is to reading mode) press back arrow to end editing mode( prompt will be ask if you want to save changes)
Functions available in note Reading mode press edit icon to edit note(bottom center) Press search icon(top right second icon) then type a word or sentence to search for it occurrence in the note. Press options menu icon(top right first icon) then press: Export (to save note as text file) copy all (to copy note to clipboard so as to past it some where) share ( to share text with people using apps(like Message app, WhatApp app, Facebook, Email,e.t.c) delete(to completely remove the note)
Functions available in Settings select note list ordering (Order by: Ascending or Descending) select note list sorting(Sort by date created or modified) select security check/time(Require system password after 1 minute, 2 minute, 3 minute, 5 minutes or none)
Functions available App Guide App Guide will show once but can by reopen to show the basic function available
App is lock. You can disable this in settings of this app. by setting lock after to \"never\"
Hello, you are not using any security on your phone, our security depends on phone security. Do you want to enable security?
"Unable to open Settings automatically to enable security. Please do it manually phone settings. "
Note does not exist in note list. Files cannot be deleted here, go to file manager
You can always come to this guide by selecting App Guide in options menu of Note List.
Click on plus sign to add note. Click on a note to read. Click on search ico to search for not that contain the type word. Click on three vertical dot(Options menu) for more options

Click on: Share ico(or Share App) to share this app link to share the others, Open File to open a file as text file in reading mode. App Guide to this guide, Help for online documentation, Settings( for security, sorting and ordering)
Click on pen sign to edit note. Search ico to search for a word in the note. Click on three vertical dot(Options menu) for more options

"Export to file(to save note as text file), copy all (to copy note to clipboard so as to past it some where), share ( to share text with people using apps(like Message app, WhatApp app, Facebook, Email,e.t.c), and delete(to completely remove the note)"
Click on top right check icon to save and exit editing mode. Click on a on top left icon to stop editing(you will ask if you want to save changes).
Select settings in note list options menu. Enable security by selecting the enable security(never to others). This will ask for finger print authentication, pin or pattern on start of the App.

Highlight text in chrome or any other app then click share in the app. List of app will be prompt to you. Select \'A Note Editor\' then it will take you to editing mode select check to save and continue with your action the other app. Or back if you intended to cancel the operation.
\"You can always reach us at raphaelraymondproduct@gmail.com.\nDon\'t forget to send us feedback at the email.
